amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the $1 million earmark for the Housatonic River Museum in Pittsfield, MA.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 111-209 to strike the $1,000,000 earmark for the Housatonic River Net-Zero Energy Building and reduce the overall cost of the bill by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Campbell amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 303 (Roll no. 581).
